channel.title: Events on CUDAN Open Lab

item.title: Cassini Nazir – Designing Collective Aspirations & Collaboration
item.description: When: 2020-11-23 14:00-16:00 (Tallinn time) Where: CUDAN Open Lab (online) The event is public via zoom: https://zoom.us/j/94858442274 Websites: https://frisco.unt.edu/cassini-nazir & https://twitter.com/cassininazir

item.title: CUDAN@ Lithuanian Academy of Music and Theatre (LMTA)
CUDAN@ NABI Art Center
item.description:
